title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define project scope, gather requirements from stakeholders, and create a detailed project plan.

title: Design System Architecture (Revised)
description: Design the overall system architecture, including components for travel recommendation, carbon footprint calculation, offsetting mechanisms, and data management. Consider scalability, modularity, and integration with third-party services. Also, outline a plan for implementing microservices, containerization, and CI/CD pipelines to ensure seamless development and deployment processes.

title: Database Design for SustainableTravelRecommender
description: Design a scalable and secure database schema to store travel options, user preferences, carbon footprint data, offsetting transactions, and other relevant data. Normalize the database design to reduce redundancy, ensure optimal indexing, define relationships between entities, and maintain data integrity. Consider partitioning strategies for handling large datasets, data privacy requirements, and best practices for performance, security, and maintenance.

title: User Interface Design (Revised)
description:
Revise the user interface design for the eco-friendly travel recommendation system. This includes input forms, search results, carbon footprint information, and display of eco-friendly travel options. The revised design should be intuitive, visually appealing, accessible to all users, mobile-responsive as a significant number of our users are expected to access the system through mobile devices.

To ensure consistency with our Design System Architecture, please integrate the design with existing UI patterns and components. Additionally, ensure that the revised design is compliant with Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) 2.1 Level AA for accessibility and responsive to different screen sizes.

For better separation of concerns, I suggest breaking down the task into smaller parts: Design Input Form, Search Results Layout, Carbon Footprint Display, and Eco-friendly Travel Options UI.

Furthermore, consider adding a feature for users to customize their preferences, such as preferred travel mode, budget, and desired eco-friendly features. Also, consider incorporating a feedback system to improve the quality of recommendations.

title: Travel Recommendation Algorithm
description: Develop the algorithm for recommending eco-friendly travel options based on user preferences and environmental impact, considering factors such as carbon footprint, sustainable transportation methods, and eco-friendly accommodations.

title: Carbon Footprint Calculation
description: Implement the logic for calculating the carbon footprint of travel options based on various factors (e.g., mode of transportation, distance, and emissions factors specific to each mode), considering the latest research and industry standards. This implementation should be modular and scalable to accommodate future improvements in data and methods. Include a detailed documentation for the calculation methodology. The code should be tested for accuracy and efficiency with emphasis on using appropriate unit testing strategies. Ensure the algorithm is optimized for performance, taking into account potential large datasets. Update the rfc_state field to 'APPROVED FOR IMPLEMENTATION' once approved. Provide your review comments in the 'review_comments' field.

title: Carbon Offsetting Integration
description:
Integrate with third-party carbon offsetting services or develop in-house mechanisms for offsetting carbon footprints. The integration should support multiple offsetting providers and allow for easy addition or removal of providers. Develop a flexible and extensible architecture to accommodate future changes in offsetting mechanisms or providers. Implement carbon offsetting options based on various travel activities such as transportation, accommodations, and activities, and provide users with transparent information about the carbon emissions offset and the corresponding cost. Consider implementing a mechanism for tracking the offsets and their impact on the environment, and allow users to view this data.

For better scalability and maintainability, ensure that the code is modular and well-documented, following best practices and design patterns.

Once the integration is complete, conduct thorough testing to ensure its functionality, performance, and security.

title: Backend Development
description: Implement the backend components, including APIs, data processing, and integration with external services.

title: Frontend Development
description: Implement the user interface components, integrating with the backend APIs and ensuring a smooth user experience.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Develop and execute test plans for functional, performance, and security testing of the application.

title: Security Audit
description: Conduct a comprehensive security audit to identify and mitigate potential vulnerabilities in the application.

title: Deployment and DevOps
description: Set up the deployment infrastructure, continuous integration/deployment pipelines, and monitoring systems for the application.

title: Documentation and User Guides
description: Create comprehensive documentation, including user guides, API documentation, and technical documentation for the application.
